g.text: Welcome to fish, the friendly interactive shell
for instructions on how to use fish

svg.script: var termtosvg_vars = { transforms: [ {transform: 'translate3D(0, 0px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)'}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -1054px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.000}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -2108px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.000}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -3162px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.174}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -4216px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.178}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -5270px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.192}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -6324px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.196}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -7378px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.202}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -8432px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.210}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -9486px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.239}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -10540px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.262}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -11594px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.262}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -12648px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.263}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -13702px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.263}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -14756px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.853}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -15810px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.854}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -16864px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.854}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -17918px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.873}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -18972px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.890}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -20026px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.895}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -21080px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.903}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -22134px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)', offset: 0.929}, {transform: 'translate3D(0, -22134px, 0)', easing: 'steps(1, end)'} ], timings: { duration: 14040, iterations: Infinity } };
